text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Runrun, runruru～n♪ ―Ah
On a day off, I was heading out to go shopping when I bumped in to Smart Falcon.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san, are you heading out too? You see, Falco's heading out to go gather some 『Input』♪

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Obviously, the kind to help become a sparkly, cute top Umadol!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: It's something I heard from a popular idol recently. 『The reason I'm the way I am, is because of lots of Input!』

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: That's why Falco has to do some studying! With a full tank, full steam ahead, until the very end!
……for some reason, I'm really worried.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Ehh…… really!? In that case, I'd like to get lots of advice☆
First, we went to the movies and saw a musical.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Ughh…… that last scene was so good. To think that the bartender was actually a descendant of Mozart……
choice_data_list: The singing and dancing was good too
The singing and dancing was good too

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Yeah, it felt so authentic, didn't it!? It's a different direction from an Umadol, but it was still wonderful～♪
Next we visited a popular theme park to see a parade.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Waaah! Look at that character! Even though they're so round, they can still move so sharply!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Yeah! It's something you couldn't do unless you practiced everyday until your body did it naturally!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Alllright, time to practice so Falco can do 10 consecutive backflips while wearing any outfit～～!
While walking down the street, we encountered a group doing freestyle rap battles.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Hyaaaa～! It's a rap battle……! It's the first time I've seen one in person…… i-it's really imposing!!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: It's like the clashing of two personas, wouldn't you say!? For an Umadol, a persona is a must but, I don't think mine is as striking……
choice_data_list: You don't need to be like a rapper

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: But but, I think it's better to have a defined persona! It's easier to find your audience that way!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: So Falco will refine my persona! To the point I can win a rap battle, I'll develop a striking and unique persona……!!
I got the feeling things were heading in the wrong direction……
When we passed by the station, we could hear the sound of intense drumming. But there weren't any drums in sight, just an empty-handed performer.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Waaah!? An air drummer!!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Amaaaazing!! They're handling the stick perfectly as they match the music coming from the speakers……!!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: It almost seems like they really have a drum! To think you could express yourself so freely using only your body! Even though Falco can only sing and dance―

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: ……No, if I try, I might be able to do it too!! Air Drumming, or even an Air Band!!
――We're heading completely off the rails here
At night, we arrived at a small park that was really popular. We could hear the sound of leaves rustling, and……

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Ah, ah, that's……!!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: If I recall―― right, a traveling monk! They travel to different places while playing their flute as training, right!?

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Even if they're alone, they continue to play their flute……! So courageous! Such guts! They must really believe in their own path, huh!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: I wonder if I've become like that yet……?

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: No, I haven't……! I haven't become a traveling monk yet……! Isn't that right, Trainer-san……!?
She had a desperate look on her face and her eyes seemed empty. Just like someone who had lost their way.
choice_data_list: You're wrong, snap out of it!
You're wrong, snap out of it!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: ―Hyaauu!?
choice_data_list: What do you want to become?
What do you want to become?

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: W-what is it that Falco wants to become……? That's, obviously―

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: ―Ah, that's right.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: ……that's right. What Falco wants to be isn't a traveling monk, a rapper, or an air drummer.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: What I want to be…… is an Umadol.
choice_data_list: Input is just used as a reference
Input is just used as a reference

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: ……Thank you, Trainer-san. I almost forgot the most important thing.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Ehehe, it was a good thing you came with me. If you hadn't, I'd probably be so confused right now.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Well, let's see…… for the movie it was the realistic performance, for the parade it was the pure skill.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: I was overwhelmed by the personas during the rap battles, and the intensity of the air drums was shocking. And the presence of being of the traveling monk.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: But everyone was so dignified, doing their best to follow their own path. That's why…… ah!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: ―Right! The thing that left the biggest impression was the sparkle in their eyes!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: For every performance, the performer and the audience, everyone's eyes were sparkling☆

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Well, the only one watching the traveling monk was us though…… ―but anyways!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: The people doing the performing were all working hard and shining, and the people watching were basking in that, I think!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: It's a reaaaaally wonderful thing, don't you think!? Falco too, it would be great if I could shine like that for someone too♪
And then, a few days later―

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Hey hey, Trainer-san, do you know about Fire Dances!?
……It seems like she's the really impressionable type. While it wasn't a bad thing to be enthusiastic about new things, I'd probably have to keep a close eye on her.
